name: Gekisou Dangun Racer: Onsoku Buster Dangun Dan
overview: The popular "Dungan Racer" from CoroCoro Comic is now available as a game! Keeping the world view of the comic as it is, the player controls his own Dangamma Shigan and aims to become a "sound speed buster". Comic characters will appear as player companions and rivals. All real Dangan Racer machines and parts are now available in the game. Players purchase machines and parts at the shop and tune the machines according to the race in the same way as the actual car. A fierce battle is expressed on a powerful big screen! You can also use the "skills" (special moves) that appear in comics.
